website_summaries.verdict: Good value in a pre-shave oil that moisturizes the skin and also can work for a post-shave application.
pros: Conditions and moisturizes beards, mustaches and other body hair
Both women and men can use it, as it has a mild scent
Made from natural oils, so it won’t affect the pores of the skin
Softens coarse facial hair to deliver a smoother shaving experience
2-ounce bottle will last a long time
cons: Thin oil that some people don’t like

customer_reviews.title: My shave was 25% closer and smoother!
customer_reviews.text: So I immediately used this per-shave oil as soon as I got it out of the box that it was sent in. My shave was 25% closer and smoother! Afterwords there was not a hint of stubble or razor rash! Completely awesome!!! Well worth the price without question. I'm bummed now that I didn't purchase the bigger bottle. My only criticism is the scent could be a little more pronounced. Its smells great out of the bottle but it diminishes completely once the shave is over. Still a 5 star product!!!
customer_reviews.author: DANNO

customer_reviews.title: Gums Up My Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, while I like the scent of the oil, it is so thick that it gums up my Phillips/Norelco Series 9000 shaver so badly that Phillips/Norelco’s cleaning unit will not work, and I have to take my shaving heads apart, wash them and dry them with compressed air in order to get out all of the gummed up bits of hair. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Weible

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after realizing how much per ounce I was spending ion pre-shave oil. On an ounce for ounce basis this is the most affordable option out there. As far as quality is concerned, using this as pre-shave oil works incredibly well, as good, if not better than the more expensive options. The smell is excellent. Not too strong and pleasing to the nose. Definitely not over perfumed. This will be my new go to pre-shave oil
customer_reviews.author: milli71

customer_reviews.title: THIS SHAVE OIL IS FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give the lemongrass & eucalyptus shave oil a high enough rating. It is a perfect combination of lemon & eucalyptus, prepares the face & beard for a great shave, & even doubles as after shave & a post shave skin moisturizer. I will reorder it the rest of my life. A HOME RUN GRAND SLAM WITH THE BASES LOADED. Dennis Graff Attorney.
customer_reviews.author: dennis graff

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the smell. She smuggles up everyday. Great value because a small drop goes a long way. Please make a body wash or shampoo with the same scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lemony fresh and great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - one of the better pre shave oils I have used. Use it both for shaving my face and bald head.
customer_reviews.author: David Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Soothing Shave
customer_reviews.text: This pre-shave oil has allowed for closer shaves without nicking or irritating my skin. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: If you want a smooth running shave, use this oil.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shave oil. This is good for pre-shave and aftershave. I love the scent. I cannot get enough of this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Messer

customer_reviews.title: Good Shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: Really good preshave oil! It's helped with reducing skin irritation and a close, smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shave
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many shave oils in an attempt to find the perfect one...yours may be it............an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shave!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. I've tried other shave oils in the past, been disappointed. This one really works. I wash my face with a mild soap, rinse, squeeze out a tiny, dime size squirt of oil into my palm, rub over my beard, than apply any shave cream over it. I get an effortless shave, no scrapes no nicks, even with multiple passes, which I need because my beard grows every which way. The result is a very close, smooth shave, skin feels moisturized, not raw, glows. The fragrance is barely noticeable, not attractive, not obnoxious, just irrelevant. Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oil, defective bottle
customer_reviews.text: This pre-shave oil is really good and the lemongrass/eucalyptus scent is amazing, much better than I would have thought. However, when you pay $12 for a 2 oz bottle, you expect to get it all. The cap on my bottle was not completely closed and it lost about half of the contents in transit. I bought the2oz bottle to try it, but next time I will go for the 8oz bottle, which is a much better value. $2.50 an ounce versus $6/oz ($12/oz in my case!)
customer_reviews.author: SDuford

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I use just a couple of squirts and it makes the razor glide over my skin so easily. I use a straight razor, so that chances of cutting myself are much higher but this lowers that chance significantly. I hardly eve nick myself since using this and when I do it is because I'm shaving too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight K. Schrute

customer_reviews.title: No more cuts or razor burn, and didn’t make my wallet bleed either!
customer_reviews.text: There are many, many options when looking for pre-shave conditioner. This was a more cost effective solution for me than others, and it’s been a great choice for me. I haven’t had any cuts while shaving, and after about a month of using this, I think my skin has been conditioned and I get much less razor burn. I will continue to use this lotion and think it does exactly what it’s supposed to at a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the scent. a little bit goes a long way. Does not leave an oily residue
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: carefully shake
customer_reviews.text: Thicker oil than my other pre shave oils. it works well because it stays on your face. The cons: I ordered the sandlewood scent but even though the label said it was sandlewood there was no scent. label said to shake before use. When I did it leaked considerably. Wish I could have what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lou H

customer_reviews.title: Feels luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing, like an herb garden, and is so much better than shaving cream. It makes my legs feel so soft and smooth, and the razor glides right along. One bottle lasts a couple of months, surprisingly. So glad I gave this a try!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Worth it + customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I never bought shaving oild before. Now I use this oil under shaving soap with a safety razor. I shave under my arms + my legs. It's an excellent product to prevent Knicks + cuts. Very well worth it + I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cat O. Powers, III

customer_reviews.title: Research usage directions
customer_reviews.text: With no directions for use that made sense I spent an inordinate amount of time finding the information on the internet. Once I found them I am still experimenting but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ian Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Good Oil
customer_reviews.text: I like this pre-shave and have become addicted to. It smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: P Silver

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: The original scent was fine but the lubrication it provides is minimal. I have been using the art of shaving and it provides much more protection. This stuff is just too watery, I have used it for two weeks and have had red bumps every time I've shaved using this and I also use shaving cream on top of it. I'm using this as hand lotion now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure I would like this product because I am very sensitive to fragrance of any kind and really wasn’t sold on a pre-shave oil, but decided to give it a try. I use it before I shave my legs and have noticed a definite difference when I use it and when I don’t. It allows for a closer shave and softer skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells wonderful, feels wonderful and has completely turned my shaving experience from dreaded to enjoyable. I'll keep buying it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amberguesa

customer_reviews.title: Your product is now a routine step in my Shaving
customer_reviews.text: Really love your product use it for the first time today great smell
customer_reviews.author: Augustus Mangrum Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pre shave product I have ever used. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pooja Vadehra

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: Overall this seems to be a good oil. I was disappointed in the scent, it didn't smell like any of the sandalwood oils I have used in the past. The shipping was quick and came well packaged. I don't use shave cream and this seems to give enough moisture and allows the razor to give me a good shave without any problems. I do have a beard so I am only shaving my neck and part of my cheeks. Price wise it is very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pre-shave oil, smells mostly of olive oil to my nose
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality pre-shave oil. It works as well as similar products and is a good value. My disappointment is it smells mostly like olive oil even after a really good shaking. I sent an email to the seller through Amazon and had not received a response after 21 days.
customer_reviews.author: BrianG

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and will always have some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use this before shaving as well as after getting out of the shower. Love the scent and my skin feels soft all day.
customer_reviews.author: K. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Have used 3xs and no nicks shaving. Does what I bought it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps give you a better smoother shave. Helps immensely if you get razor burn. Great scent as well
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Makes shaving great
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this oil for a pre-shave oil. He uses a double edge razor. The oil makes the razor glide on the skin. The oil also tends to make the blades last longer. He uses only one squirt of the oil. This is the 2nd bottle purchased. Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Wills

product_meta.title: 2 fl. Oz, Lemongrass & Eucalyptus Pre Shave Oil for Men, Premium Pre Shave Oil, Excellent Shaving oil for Men with Sensitive Skin, Prepares for a burns free Shave, Works with Straight or Safety Razor
feature_bullets: ✓ WHY PRE SHAVE OIL: Our pre shave oil is formulated with naturally moisturizing, skin & hair loving oils like jojoba oil, grapeseed oil and avocado oil, our special formula ensures oil consistency & texture is not too thin that it does not create enough gliding or not too thick that it clogs the razors.

✓ WHO NEEDS IT: Men of any age or skin type, from rigid skin & hair to most sensitive skin, our pre shave oil works equally great to protect your skin from razor burns, red bumps, ingrown hair, nicks or cuts. Skin loving oils like jojoba oil provides an extra layer of protection while leaving the skin hydrated aftershave.

✓ HOW IT WORKS: It works by moisturizing skin and softening hair follicles that results in reduced friction with razor resulting in smooth, irritation cuts & bruise free aftershave experience. Leaves skin rejuvenated
✓ SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Our pre shave oil will provide the best shave you every had, if not, you will get 100% refund. No questions asked.
✓ SCENTS: Our Pre Shave Oils have been crafted specially for Men, Unique Masculine subtle scents make it an enjoyable shaving experience.
